turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: I need your help, Master.  I'm seeking a man who used to train with you.  He's become a killer - the worst kind of animal.

turns.speaker: MASTER FU
turns.text: Animals kill only from hunger or fear. The man you seek is lower than a serpent.  ...he kills for money.

turns.speaker: MASTER FU
turns.text: He was the best I ever trained, you know.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Ricky Tan?

turns.speaker: MASTER FU
turns.text: No.  Your father.  Your father and Ricky Tan were my favorite students... and for such awful things to happen as they did --

turns.speaker: MASTER FU
turns.text: A seeding spends its entire life reaching towards Heaven.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: I know, Master, but...

turns.speaker: MASTER FU
turns.text: The answers you seek can be found in Heaven on Earth.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Heaven on Earth?  Master, I don't understand.  A temple, where Heaven is on Earth?  A mountain, where Earth reaches for the --

turns.speaker: MASTER FU
turns.text: It's a massage parlor downtown.  "Heaven on Earth."  You will find your answers there.

turns.speaker: SPECIAL AGENT STERLING
turns.text: Chin, you have been ordered by the Ministry of Public Security to assist the FBI and Secret Service with our investigation, to provide us with whatever we need.  If you have information, it belongs to us.

turns.speaker: SUPERINDENDENT CHIN
turns.text: This is still Hong Kong.

turns.speaker: SPECIAL AGENT STERLING
turns.text: Two Americans have been killed on United States Government property -- this is our investigation.

turns.speaker: SUPERINDENDENT CHIN
turns.text: Chief Inspector Lee will brief your people...

turns.speaker: SPECIAL AGENT STERLING
turns.text: No.  He will report to me.  Do we understand each other?

turns.speaker: SPECIAL AGENT STERLING
turns.text: Who the hell is that?

turns.speaker: SUPERINDENDENT CHIN
turns.text: That is...Chief Inspector Lee.  The detective in charge of our investigation.

turns.speaker: SPECIAL AGENT STERLING
turns.text: Put a diaper on him, Chin.  I want to talk to the great Inspector Lee.

turns.speaker: MAN'S VOICE
turns.text: You don't move, you understand?!  You don't move!

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Do I look like I'm movin'?!  What you're seeing here?  This is not movement. This is my "still".

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: You know what a phone booth is?!

turns.speaker: MAN'S VOICE
turns.text: The bomb was meant as a demonstration of our sincerity.  If you want the Ambassador's daughter back alive, listen and do not talk.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Lee!  It's him!

turns.speaker: MAN'S VOICE
turns.text: The first drop will be made tomorrow. At twelve o'clock.  The amount will be fifty million.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Fifty million!  Are we talkin' United States dollars?

turns.speaker: MAN'S VOICE
turns.text: In used currency.  Nothing bigger than a fifty.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: That's some serious poundage in dollars.

turns.speaker: MAN'S VOICE
turns.text: What is your name?

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: That's cool.  We're gettin' to know each other. This is a good thing. I'm Carter.

turns.speaker: MAN'S VOICE
turns.text: Carter.  I just want to be able to tell the Ambassador who was responsible for the death of his daughter because he talked too much.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Hey, that's whacked!  I thought we was gettin' on here!

turns.speaker: MAN'S VOICE
turns.text: Shut up!

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: OK. Say what it is.

turns.speaker: MAN'S VOICE
turns.text: The Ambassador will receive instructions for the drop, half an hour before it is to be made.  If it is successful, there will be more. Thank you, Agent Carter.

turns.speaker: DIEL
turns.text: I don't know what went wrong last night, but this department could've lost one detective and our only explosives expert.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Sir, I can explain.

turns.speaker: DIEL
turns.text: What you did was dangerous and completely outside policy.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: I know, but --

turns.speaker: DIEL
turns.text: That's probably the only reason Johnson's still alive.

turns.speaker: DIEL
turns.text: Good job.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Hey, sir, it was a pleasure to preserve Johnson's ass.  Well...you know what I mean.

turns.speaker: DIEL
turns.text: I got a call from the F.B.I.  The daughter of the Chinese Ambassador has been kidnapped and they asked for help. You're it.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Feds asked for me?

turns.speaker: DIEL
turns.text: They asked for the best street man I had.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: And that, of course, would be me.

turns.speaker: DIEL
turns.text: Don't push it. You better watch your ass with these Fed types. If there's a screw-up, they won't think twice about burnin' it.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Ooo, there's a chill.  Love that.

turns.speaker: WHITNEY
turns.text: Carter.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: He stole my wheel!

turns.speaker: WHITNEY
turns.text: This is pathetic.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: I'm gonna arrest the sonuvabitch!  Your ass is goin' to jail!

turns.speaker: WHITNEY
turns.text: He'll be OK. Russ is a tough son of a bitch.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Tell me about it.

turns.speaker: WHITNEY
turns.text: He was just doing his job.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: So was I.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: You talk very fast.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Okay, I'll slow down.  So we go downtown and we ask you a few questions... you know, like what's your name?  How old are you?  You ever expose yourself in public...shit like that.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Beach Boy.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: You're shittin' me.  You know the Beach Boys?!

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Beach Boy America.  Help me Rhonda, help me get her out of my --

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Help me Rhonda.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Let me give you a piece of advice: never touch another man's radio. You do it again, nobody, not Rhonda, not Yolanda, gonna save your ass.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: You have one of these?

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: No.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Yeah, well you're in American now. Everybody's got guns.  That tricky shit with your hands is gonna get your ass shot to hell.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: You speak English!

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: A little.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Bullshit a little.  You lied to me.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: I didn't say I didn't.  You assumed I didn't.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: It's the same thing!

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: I am not responsible for your assumptions.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: You're full of shit.  Do you understand what I'm saying to you? Full of shit?

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Not being able to speak is not the same as not speaking.  You seemed as if you liked to talk.  I like to let people talk who like to talk.  It makes it easier to find out how full of shit they are.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Okay, fine, you're full a shit, I'm full a shit.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: We are both full of shit.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Yeah, that's right.  Now that we understand each other... show me how you did that.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: I am afraid I don't understand the importance of this information.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Look, you want to work in this country, you gotta know this crap. Okay?  We're gonna be in some deep shit here.  Working the danger zone. And you need insurance.  Cause, you know, you might be starting some riots and shit.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: -- what the hell is that?

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: What?

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: That silly-ass look on your face.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: I was being polite.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Well don't do that.  Polite don't work here.  You do that polite shit here in America, they'll sue your ass for harassment.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Where were we?

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Witnesses.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Wait. You hungry?  You gotta be hungry, you just flew in from China. And what'd they feed you, Chinese food, right?  Then you gotta be hungry.  Hell, it doesn't matter, I'm hungry.  We'll get some food on the way to the Consulate.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: I thought you were taking me to the consulate.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Oh yeah, but this is on the way.  And you gotta see John Wayne's footprints. Everybody does. It's almost like a law. You can't believe how small his feet were for a dude that big. Tiny god damn feet!

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: You're a regular god damn acrobat, aren't you?  Bet you feel real good makin' me look like an asshole.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: It was not my intent --

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Right....

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Mr. Carter, I appreciate your desire to show me a good time, but that is not the reason I am here.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Let me just clarify a few things.  I don't care what kind of cop you are in China, you have no jurisdiction in America.  Without me you are just another tourist.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: What about them?

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: I know a shortcut.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Shortcut?

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: You don't know what a shortcut is?

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: You make the plate?

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: What plate?

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: The license!  You get it?!

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: No.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: What the hell kinda cop are you?!

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Did you make the plate?!

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: It was my ass that almost got trashed!

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: He was trying to kill me, not you.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Yeah, sure, you got lots a enemies in L.A. after what?  Six hours?

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: It was a man I was after in Hong Kong.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Bullshit!  You were trying' to lose my ass again.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: When a man steps in dung, it is obvious.  There is no need to rub it in his face.  The smell is the same.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: What is that, some kind of Chinese proverb?

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: No. I just made it up.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: I worked with Ambassador Han and his family for ten years.  He wanted me to come with them to America.  If I had, this might not have happened.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Don't go there...

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: I could not come.  I had other responsibilities.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Hey, stop.  We're just gonna wind up in some bar, drinking' to forget all the things we shoulda done and then you'll start singin' Beach Boy songs again. Then I'll really get depressed.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: I also did not come because I think I would not fit in America.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Hey, everybody fits in here. Look at L.A., man.  Nobody's from here.  My momma's from Detroit, my dad's from Atlanta, they met in Texas, got married in Vegas and I was born in Alabama.  So where the hell am I from? Kenya?

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Alright, listen, no bullshit just tell me straight: did you really know the guy you were chasin'?

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Yes. He was part of the Juntao crime family. He may be Juntao himself.  And he dropped this.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: When we go inside, you let me handle everything, you hear?  This is my man, you dig?  My informant. You know what an informant is?

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Stooly.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: What?

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Stool pigeon.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Yeah, somethin' like that.  OK, now this is a nasty ass place. When you go into a place like this, the most important thing is control. You got to maintain control. You following me? You lose it, you get hurt. Now, you're my responsibility and I don't want you hurt. You understand?  OK, let's go.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: You talk too fast.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Come on!

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Let's go.  Everybody take off?

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Took off. Yes. They took off.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: You see what I'm sayin'? You control the space.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Thank you. I learn a great deal.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: It happens.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Let's get us a photo and description. We'll have an APB out while we stake out the restaurant.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: That is a problem. There is no description of Juntao. No known photograph.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Are you tellin' me nobody knows what he looks like?  Come on, there must be witnesses somewhere.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Juntao's standing orders were to kill everyone. There were never witnesses.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: You like it?

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Yeah, it's good.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: That one is my favorite.  Chicken puff with shark fin.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: You want more?

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: No, no.  I'm full. Too much fin and hump, you know, gives me gas.  scuse me.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Now, that's American music.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Yes, I know this song.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: You know War?

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Who does not know War?  ³War, hhh, Wo-ooh-wo-ooh-wo-oh.  What is it good for?  Absolutely nothing. Good-God, you all.²

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: That's not how it goes.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Yes, I think so.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: No, no.  It's not good-God you all! It's Good-God, ya'll.  Ya'll!

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Yee-aww.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Not yee-aw, Ya'll.  And it's gotta be angry.  Like you're pissed off.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Good God, ya'll!

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: No! You hate me.  Look, I'm gonna do it one time.  That's it.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Are you OK?

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: I got to stop that dancing in the street till all hours.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Want some?

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: No, fish is a PM food.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Excuse me?

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Nobody in America eats fish in the AM. We're talking strictly an after twelve noon food type.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: What?!

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: It's him.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Which one?

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Going into the restaurant.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: This is my territory now.  You are my responsibility.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: This concrete?  This is still America.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: What do you hear?

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: OK, when you go in, just act like you're from outa town.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: I am from outa town.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: No, like a tourist.  You know, things to see, money to burn, interested in stupid shit.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Like that.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: I am sorry, but I have too much respect for women.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: No, please, I don't --

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: It ain't your ass, it's my ass you're backin' up.  Take the damn gun.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: No, wait.  I don't have it.  You have it.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Oh yes.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Oh no, I dropped it.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: You drop my gun and you lose my i.d.?

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: I'm sorry.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: I'm sorry, Lee.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Be sorry for Soon Young. She has no chance now.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: What are you doing here?

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Well, I ain't goin' to China.  And neither are you.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Oh no.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: What?

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: The art.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: No, it is China, my country, my history.  If any of it gets damaged...

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Hey, don't worry.  Nothing's gonna happen to it.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Oh my god. Griffin.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: You know him?

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: What a surprise!

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: FBI calls up my ass, says they need help in Tokyo.  Like I'm supposed to drop everything.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: It's Hong Kong, not Tokyo.  My country asked for the best.  I told them that was you.  Now I will show you around my hood.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: No shark fin, no camel hump.  What you listenin' to?

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Oh, I think you like this very much.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Yeah...beautiful. What would you call that paper there? Kind of a...Robin egg blue color?

turns.speaker: JOHNSON
turns.text: Good. That's standard military packaging for plastique. Get a look under it.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Not anymore.

turns.speaker: JOHNSON
turns.text: Where'd you get it?

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: You're killin' me here.

turns.speaker: JOHNSON
turns.text: Carter, just because you saved my butt, doesn't mean it's yours.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Oh, baby, you cruel...

turns.speaker: JOHNSON
turns.text: Last night's as much my fault as yours.  If he's gonna put the blame on anybody --

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Hey, I was senior. It's OK. This is why I get the big bucks.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Hey, baby, it's cool.  Captain just reassigned me to the Feds.

turns.speaker: JOHNSON
turns.text: The Feds?!

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: FBI needs a taste of the street. And I'm it.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Way he put it, I was the only one he thought could handle it. But you know what the worst thing is?

turns.speaker: JOHNSON
turns.text: No...what?

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: I could get promoted right out of here.

turns.speaker: JOHNSON
turns.text: What's wrong with that?

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: I wouldn't be close to you.  What is that perfume, girl?

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: How'd what go?

turns.speaker: JOHNSON
turns.text: With the FBI. What do you think I'm talking about?

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Oh, you're not gonna believe what they put me in charge of.  They sent for the Ambassador's personal Chinese Investigator type.  He is like the baddest Asian shield they got.  And I, let me repeat that, I am the man who is on the case with him.  Just the two of us, alone, workin' the whole deal as a team.

turns.speaker: JOHNSON
turns.text: They put you in charge?

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: In Charge.  Just me'n him.  No interference.  They don't even want to hear from us until we're done.  I love the F.B.I.  I love the F.B.I.

turns.speaker: JOHNSON
turns.text: Well...listen, if you need any help, you know, back up, call me, OK?

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Oh baby, don't worry, I'll call you. You can count on it.

turns.speaker: JOHNSON
turns.text: OK. Well...make us proud.  And be careful.

turns.speaker: JOHNSON
turns.text: Well.. I wouldn't want to be in the way.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: No way in the way!  I'm talkin' back up, Johnson. I'm in charge! And I need you, baby.

turns.speaker: JOHNSON
turns.text: You got a lot of guts calling me.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Yes I do. That's all I got. Guts and you, Johnson. There's no one else I can trust.

turns.speaker: JOHNSON
turns.text: You made a fool out of me! In front of the FBI!

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Listen, this ain't about us! It's about a thirteen year old girl. She's not gonna make it. Unless we do something.

turns.speaker: JOHNSON
turns.text: Jesus...what do you want?

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: This whole thing is goin' down tonight. I need to know where the Ambassador is gonna be. The Feds will be keepin' a lid on everything. You thing you can do that?

turns.speaker: JOHNSON
turns.text: This is my city. I'm a cop. I'll find em.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Alright, Johnson, thank you.  So...what are you wearing?

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Oh my god...what happened to you?

turns.speaker: JOHNSON
turns.text: It's called a dress.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: It's called you're gonna kill me. What're you doin' with that on?

turns.speaker: JOHNSON
turns.text: Wait a minute. I'm not riding in that.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: What?! This is a class ride, Johnson.

turns.speaker: JOHNSON
turns.text: Yeah, if you're Superfly.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: That's it! You can attack me, but when you attack my car, I cannot forgive! You in the back, girl!

turns.speaker: JOHNSON
turns.text: You don't like it?

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: It's okay. For restaurants.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: You OK?

turns.speaker: JOHNSON
turns.text: We saved the girl and got the bad guys, didn't we?

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Yeah. So why you look do down?

turns.speaker: JOHNSON
turns.text: Look at me! My dress is ruined. I look like shit.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Not to me. Never to me.

turns.speaker: JOHNSON
turns.text: How about a lift home?

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Absolutely. I'll even let you ride in the front seat.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Any demands yet?

turns.speaker: RUSS
turns.text: At this point we don't have much.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: How much they want?

turns.speaker: RUSS
turns.text: You come highly recommended, Carter. And your particular assignment requires a special talent.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Interrogation is one a my specialties, but undercover work is my forte.

turns.speaker: RUSS
turns.text: ... the director considers this top priority, considering he is a Chinese National and here under difficult circumstances.  His name is Lee.  And he is to be shown every courtesy. Within reason.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Sir, he's just gonna get in my way. If I'm gonna handle this situation...

turns.speaker: RUSS
turns.text: He is the situation.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: I'm talking about the girl.

turns.speaker: RUSS
turns.text: Don't worry about the kidnapping, Carter, the F.B.I. will handle that. Your assignment is Lee.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: What kind of assignment is that?

turns.speaker: RUSS
turns.text: Bottom line: I don't want some Chung King Cop getting his head blown off and turning this operation into a international incident.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Why don't you assign one of your own men to this?

turns.speaker: RUSS
turns.text: Because with your special talents, I'm sure you'll do a better job.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: What the hell am I supposed to do with him? Take him to the zoo?

turns.speaker: RUSS
turns.text: Just make him think you're following leads.  Interview some suspects, look at fingerprints, do detective shit.  I don't care.  I just don't want to see him- or you, for that matter- until this is resolved.  Now, we want to make a good impression, don't we?  His plane lands in an hour. Don't be late.

turns.speaker: RUSS
turns.text: What do you mean you lost him?! How could you lose him?!

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Try a bus load of - no, make that two bus loads of Chinese --

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: You understand what I'm sayin'?

turns.speaker: RUSS
turns.text: Carter, shut up!

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Yo, Johnson...

turns.speaker: RUSS
turns.text: You think this is funny, Carter?  You send for someone from Explosives!? Four men just died in there!

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Hey, man, you can use her. She's an expert!

turns.speaker: RUSS
turns.text: That's what you were supposed to be!

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Hmmmm?

turns.speaker: RUSS
turns.text: Don't play bullshit games with me.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Eleven thirty tomorrow the Ambassador will receive a phone call telling him where the drop is.  He said the bomb was a demonstration of their sincerity.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Oh yeah.  The caller was a man. Confident.  Had an accent.  My guess, Asian.  Anything else I can do for the FBI, sir?

turns.speaker: RUSS
turns.text: Why don't you try the assignment.  Or should I call and ask for somebody who can handle it?

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: No, sir. I'm as good as it gets.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Okay, let me start from the top.  A few days ago I was on this munitions dealer named Lafontaine. Now, after the shit blew up last night...

turns.speaker: RUSS
turns.text: I'm not interested, Carter.  You're no longer on this assignment.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: What?!

turns.speaker: RUSS
turns.text: And your buddy, Mr. Lee, is on his way back to China.  Now, get out. Before I file obstruction of justice charges against you.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Hey, hey, you start touching me there, I'm gonna start movin'! Word up, mother...

turns.speaker: LAFONTAINE
turns.text: Shut up!

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: You a cop or something?

turns.speaker: LAFONTAINE
turns.text: Or somethin'.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: This is not a good way to start a relationship, stickin' a gun to a man's head, feelin' around his personal equipment.  Make him think you don't trust him.

turns.speaker: LAFONTAINE
turns.text: I don't trust anybody.  Especially first time deals.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: I oughta pat your ass down.  Make sure you're not a cop.

turns.speaker: LAFONTAINE
turns.text: Nobody touches me.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Shit, I ain't interested in puttin' my hands on you.  That does nothin' for me.  No. I don't need to be pattin' no ass. All I'm sayin' is, how do I know you're not a cop?

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: You know something? Every time I see this stuff, it reminds me of...uh...a double latte grande...  With two shots of non-fat milk.

turns.speaker: LAFONTAINE
turns.text: What are you talking about?

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: What's this little green wire coming out one side of the package?

turns.speaker: LAFONTAINE
turns.text: I wouldn't touch that if I were you.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Okay, look, we're gonna make a trade. You cross the street, leave her on the sidewalk.  I will leave him on this side.  Then we trade places.  You get him, I get her.  Get the picture, Lois?

turns.speaker: LAFONTAINE
turns.text: Do it!

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: You got a boy friend in here yet? Cause you're gonna need somebody to kiss your ass goodbye.

turns.speaker: LAFONTAINE
turns.text: What are you talking about?

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: You're movin' to death row. See, your fingerprints are now on the murder weapon of Four FBI Agents. And when I turn this into the lab, they're gonna find Lafontaine all over it. And we already know...  ...this is your MO.

turns.speaker: LAFONTAINE
turns.text: How did I do this?! Maybe you didn't notice but I'm in jail!

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: All I gotta do is implicate.  The Feds can do a lot with a good implication. Even if you don't get Sparky, I'll bet you get ten to twenty more. Plenty of time to find a nice fella.

turns.speaker: LAFONTAINE
turns.text: You sonuvabitch.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: I'm waitin' here for a name.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Where do we find him?

turns.speaker: LAFONTAINE
turns.text: You don't. He finds you. Through his people.

turns.speaker: HAN
turns.text: Hello.

turns.speaker: SANG'S VOICE
turns.text: Ambassador Han.

turns.speaker: HAN
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: SANG'S VOICE
turns.text: Even if you deny the FBI is there, I will assume you are lying.

turns.speaker: HAN
turns.text: My daughter.

turns.speaker: SANG'S VOICE
turns.text: She's fine.

turns.speaker: HAN
turns.text: Can I speak with her?

turns.speaker: HAN
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: SANG'S VOICE
turns.text: You have run out of time.  The amount now is two hundred million.  I will call later with instructions.  You will either deliver the money or pick up the body of your daughter.

turns.speaker: HAN
turns.text: Please, you must understand, what happened today was not --

turns.speaker: HAN
turns.text: Hello.

turns.speaker: SANG'S VOICE
turns.text: Take the money with you tonight. Pack it in six dragons. You will be contacted again.

turns.speaker: HAN
turns.text: I want to speak with my daughter!

turns.speaker: HAN
turns.text: Hello.

turns.speaker: MAN'S VOICE
turns.text: Han?

turns.speaker: HAN
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: MAN'S VOICE
turns.text: It's Griffin.

turns.speaker: HAN
turns.text: Griffin?  Where are you.

turns.speaker: HAN
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: MAN'S VOICE
turns.text: You have what I asked for?

turns.speaker: HAN
turns.text: I do.

turns.speaker: MAN'S VOICE
turns.text: Pack it into black garbage bags. Throw the bags into a garbage dump in the alley behind the Fang Shan Restaurant in China Town.  You have twenty-nine minutes left.

turns.speaker: HAN
turns.text: I would like one of my people to help.

turns.speaker: RUSS
turns.text: Ambassador, let me assure you that the FBI has made this a top priority. We have plenty of manpower on the case.

turns.speaker: HAN
turns.text: He is very good.

turns.speaker: RUSS
turns.text: As I said, sir, we've got all the people we need.

turns.speaker: HAN
turns.text: I am not an American, Mr. Russ.  My daughter is not an American.

turns.speaker: RUSS
turns.text: I understand, sir. But you are an honored guest of the United States...

turns.speaker: HAN
turns.text: He is already on the plane.  I hope you will treat him with the same respect you have shown me.

turns.speaker: HAN
turns.text: Come on. Let's get you some dry clothes.

turns.speaker: RUSS
turns.text: Carter, can I have a moment?
